scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Daybook, 1867-1870, of Hugh P. Chew who owned a hat store in Fredericksburg, Virginia. It records in chronological order the store's daily transactions. Information found in daybook includes date of transaction, name of customer, hat purchased, amount owed, amount paid. The last few pages record the individual accounts of customers. Each account lists transactions in chronological order.
